summary: MY DISPLAY LIGHTS ON MY RADIO STARTED DIMMING IN AND OUT.  NOW THEY ARE COMPLETELY GONE.  I TOOK IT TO MY LOCAL FORD DEALER AND THEY TOLD ME THAT IT WOULD COST AT LEAST $350 FOR THEM TO SEND IT OFF AND HAVE IT REPAIRED.  THERE ARE SEVERAL OTHER SAME VEHICLES WHO HAVE THE SAME PROBLEM.    *NLM
